title: Denali National Park & Preserve: Videos and Other Resources
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Distance Learning     Videos and Other Resources                Resources for Distance Learning Programs       The videos on this page are meant to be used in conjunction with one of our distance learning programs.       Denali: The High One (Geology of the Mountain)  The video below is part of our geology distance learning program.                        Climbing Denali This open-captioned, four minute clip from "Climbing Denali" demonstrates the beauty and danger inherent in climbing North America's highest peak.   Duration:4 minutes, 3 seconds               The Science of Sled Dogs  The videos below are a part of our "Science of Sled Dogs" distance learning program.                        "Winter Patrol" Share this short clip (~5 minute) with your class in preparation for teaching the Science of Sled Dogs lesson.  Duration:5 minutes, 13 seconds                                Sled Dog Curriculum Extension Activity - Cabin Life Get a feel for what a sled dog patrol is like through this short video, shot in winter 2012.  Duration:7 minutes, 15 seconds
